archeologists also believe they have found Bluebeard's flagship, in waters off North Carolina; more searches are planned for Bluebeard's other ships; pirate spoils, including gold from Africa, appear to have been carefully divided among crew members, and weapons like primitive grenades may have been used more for intimidation than for blasting apart ships; photos; Philip Masters, whose team found wreck believed to be Bluebeard's Queen Anne's Revenge, says pirates were not 'monsters' of legend; Dr David Cordingly, revisionist chronicler, says they had little time for niceties like walking the plank and typical plunder was not doubloons but more prosaic cargo; site will offer children games, puzzles and stories featuring favorite Disney cartoon characters, as well as news report written for children, sports scores and sports highlights; Disney Daily Blast will be company's third Web site, but first one aimed at its traditional audience--children--and first to charge subscription fee;
